name: Tower Ad Infinitum
description:
You wronged those closest to you and must pay your penance. You must wander the tower endlessly until you may, one day, find salvation.  But beware, turning back will anger the spirit of death and you will return from whence you came.

WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Jump
E - Interact

Pressing "A" can help if you get stuck.

"Scifi Industrial Ambient 1" Music File provided by Solar_Phasing

MasterZX Asset Design and Planning

JaxZX
Mechanics Design and Implementation

Go vote now in Ludum Dare 47 at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/$226020
